reviews.review: Fun game to play casually but tryharding results in toxicity from both teams so i recommend to not take this game too seriously

love this game, but be wary. this game is bug ridden, glitchy, and basically breaks every time theres a patch or update. There is a learning curve, and you will rage as both killer and survivor with all the bugs , glitches and lag that cause you to die or lose a kill, but still, its a decent game overall. Just wish the Devs would fix it.

8/10 fun game, killer side can be hard to juggle at times but keeps you busy where as the surv is laid back for the most part, until the killer finds you that is and jump scares galore. Perks to play your own way for both sides and several characters to choose from to have fun with some groups work well and other just don't... just do the best you can with what you've got to work. GL & HF. :)

God. Way back when, I used to like watching gameplay of this game. Since then, it's gone on a straight nosedive as the community got permanently toxic, and the devs kept ignoring it, or straight up promoting it, or even making it worse. They even dove into using EAC and fucking NFTs even though they knew those were both awful things. Now there's so many dlcs and everyone's so shitty... Just don't, ok. Don't.

Hi everyone,

I love playing Nancy. 10/10

Dead by Daylight is a interesting game, however the community is unbearably toxic. The most players will go out of their way to make your experience miserable, both sides, equally. Their goal isn't to win its to make sure you DIDN'T have fun. This is the most sadistic player base you will have the displeasure of playing with.

And this game also has the most insane grind it unironically takes hundreds, if not thousands, of hours.

and the monetization is criminal. full priced game + DLC is about 350ish USD + battlepass + ingame cosmetic store.

I've dedicated far to many hours to this game as well as watching prob 4x my playtime in videos and streams.

I cannot recommend this game, because the people who play it. STAY AWAY

this game is fun when you're either playing the killer or survivor it's very skill based so it will take time to get good at this game but honestly there is a rank reset that doesn't seem really fair because you always will see all the red ranks players de-ranking just to play against and it makes it less fun for new players same goes for killers with SWF being a thing but when you get passed all that its honestly an amazing game you will get tilted so i guess just have fun :^)

Great game, it has a few bugs and problems and you will be frustrated at times, but feeling yourself actually get better is one of the most satisfying things about this game. The Devs are also extremely involved and participate in the community. do not expect AAA thrice balance checked quality, expect an interesting (albeit somewhat toxic) community and constantly updating game

Hi! \o
Das Spiel ist √ºberhaupt nicht mehr zu empfehlen - wenn es das jemals war. Anstatt mal etwas f√ºr die Survivor reinzubringen, kriegen die Killer immer gr√∂√üere Hitboxen, dass ein Freddy einen trifft, obwohl man auf der anderen Paltettenseite ist, oder beim Fenster schon nen Kilometer durch. Auch die Hexe mit ihren Langfingern und OP Perks, dass sie sich ohne dass der Survivior es merkt die Falle ausgel√∂st zu heben, porten kann. Die Nurse mit ihren Einemilliarden Ports direkt hintereinander und alle anderen Killer nicht zu vergessen. Statt, dass sie den Schei√ü fixen, kommen sie mit nem neuen Eventkram um die Ecke, was sie dann noch verkacken, inklusive Halloween Event und beide dann erst eine Woche sp√§ter kommern (wenn Halloween gleich vorbei ist). Es ist einfach nur noch ein reines Killerspiel. Die Killer machen sich nen Spa√ü drau√ü, hampeln vor einem auf der Hatch rum, campen, Facecampen, tunneln, keine Ahnung was noch alles. Es macht als Survivor √ºberhaupt keinen Spa√ü mehr. Und das sehen sehr viele andere aus. Kriegt den Schei√ü endlich mal richtig hingeschissen und versucht nicht euch dauernd bei der Community zu rechtfertigen, mit Gr√ºnden die einfach dumm und hinrissig sind.

4. Mit ein bisschen Hirn sind Killer unaufhaltbare M√§hdrescher die dein Team nurnoch wegfressen und dir kein bisschen Spielspa√ü √ºbrig lassen.
5. Und wenn man selber mal in den Genuss des Dreschens kommen will kann man 4 Stunden in der Warteschlange warten, da jeder Penner meint er m√ºsse alle nur abschlachten.

6. Das aller beste ist die F√§higkeit mit der man einfach alles mit einem Schlag t√∂tet SEHR FAIR. Das Spiel wird immer leichter f√ºr den Killer.
